about_the_game:
Sex motel 🔞 is a game with a lot of sex.

You begin the game in the cool motel with a lot of rooms. All rooms can be opened and available for exploration. You can check them one by one and see what exactly people are doing there in the night. This is a very cool motel, and it will surprise you on every corner. You will enjoy exploring it! You can interact with objects, switch On or Off the light, open or close doors of the furniture, flush the toilet etc.

The motel has 21 room, fitness hall with 10 sex devices and one main office, each room contain something interesting and, of course, erotic. In every room you will see fucking couples or trios or even something more interesting. You can find sex on each step, and in some rooms, you can easily join to the sex act.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant game play, unlocking sexually enticing interactions that reveal the profound aspects of the characters' relationships. The gaming experience will be filled with incredibly seductive visual effects, realistic sounds, and detailed characters, making the game even more appealing.

The game is LGBT friendly and in the last 5 rooms you can find gay sex.

You will see:
- Masturbation
- Hand job
- Blowjob
- Vaginal Sex
- Anal Sex
…even more to explore!
This game does not have any boring story, it is just sex, sex, sex!

In this game you will never lose, you will not get the message "Game over!" The only thing which you may see is orgasm at the end of the sex act.

So, discover this cool Sex motel and don't stop until you check all its rooms!

Good luck!

content_descriptors.notes: In this game the characters are naked and are having sex in each room.

name: Sex motel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: 12 Core CPU 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 or AMD Radeon 6000 At last 8 Gb of the VRAM
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
